summary: Defines a collection of Django REST Framework serializers that transform internal security models and data structures—such as enrichment entries, feed definitions, and generic honeypot records—into JSON-friendly representations for API responses, while applying format and type validation using regular expressions and custom checks.
business_intent: Expose security-related data (feeds, indicators of compromise, honeypot information) through a RESTful API with validated, well‑structured payloads to ensure reliable consumption by external clients and services.
